There Are So Many Things To Look Forward To All The Pain And Beauty An Endless Sea People And Contemplations I Will Make or Forget And All The Mistakes That I Will Never Regret To Live..Will Be An Awfully Big Adventure

There Are So Many Things
That We Learn
That Sometimes....We Will Have Hopes Of Forgetting
You See......It's In Time Like These When Im Cold And Uncomfortable
I Begin To Think Of How Much Pain And Beauty
There Is That Is Beyond All Of Our Thought And Reason..
I Am Not One To Persue Antidisestablishmentarianism
But Sometimes I Just Think We'd Be Better Off
Without The Heavy Influences Of Anything At All

.... Athazagoraphobia

Today I met Bud the drummer of sublime he talked about drugs He said exactly how Brad Nowell looked when he died Brad said he would to heroin one more time so he did in the morning he looked over at Brad naked and feet hanging off the bed and said " looks like you had a rough night huh"? and Brad didnt respond Lou dog was hovered over him whimpering So Bud looked at Brad and he was pale blue and Dead Cold He had Bile and mucus all over his face.. that was to be the last day Bud would do heroin Sublime was a talented band even though they give me bad memories i respect Bud alot because unlike alot of people He had succeeded in bettering himself and admitted to being wrong

cause i want to do it my wayx2
i want to flyx2



the problem with rules is they alienate the criminals
when whose to say if what they did was wrong that day
if you'd open your mind up
you'd see that there is nothing that's always wrong
no matter what you say
it's just not true that there's only one way
cuz i want to do it my wayx2
cuz i want to flyx2


i hope we have ourselves an understanding

This Was A true Story

Her eyes are made a river
From a crystal lake that Called her in
Never Been able much to consider
Until This Season Comes Again
I Wrote for you my way
On a dollar bill
i am yours for crying when you are away
I pray for how you feel
Ill will be holding your things
until you come home
Pretty darling when the birds begin to sing
i will see you again
when you return from within
the teeth of a metal sea


Kristina..
Wherever you are i hope that you will be safe
i held you when you were crying
and i felt your pain in me
Sleep pretty darling Theres nothing we can do now

Play Loud 540: yep ur just still the same old little girl that i loved

lost in translation

let us think of this
as nothing more than it is
lets never come back here again
because it wouldn't be as fun
let us walk and never look back
to see the other left behind
and let us think of this 
as nothing, because it is

we have to part
to be apart
two hands hold, two hands let go
Come Close
let me whisper in your ear
all the things I don't want to say
That you don't want to hear
you have something (some new friend) when you leave here
I'll only find myself lost
Lost again
Lost in our langauge and lost in translation

i kissed you goodbye
but i didn't mean it
I can never let you go
Even if I have to be alone
I walked, I didn't look back
Because I didn't want you to see me cry
Goodbye, My Small Love, Goodbye

I Have Seen Fire That Sits Ontop The Sea
And I Have Seen The Beauty
Of The Falling Autumn Leaves
There Are Books With Endless Pages
And There Are People That Have No Rights
There Are Words And Then Theres Meaning
When We Say Things In The Night
I Know I Should Be heading Home
You See I Have Things To Do
It's Late But Were Alone
But I....Rather Take The Long Way With You...
With you

Thank You Jeremy

*Lost In Translation*

Here we go...

Every page has a picture every 2 
lines is a page under the lines is a 
description of the picture that would be there

* You might wanna skip the picture detail and read the poem first*

This Story is of an old Ant
Sitting at a bar 
Singing the story of his life
hes half drunk
and no one is really listening
But he Still sings..

...
When First I Saw The Sun
I Thought That I Was Dreaming
(An Ant with a Mining hat on squinting up at a crack in the dirt)

Of a Heaven comming through the walls
They Told Me I was crazy
(Other ants laughing at him and the queen ant looking displeased)

i escaped and it took a while to get my legs
So i ran off to the sea
(Ant Running to a puddle)

I Built a boat and sailed away
to were she'd never find me
(Ant sailing on a leaf)

What i say ive seen and what ive seen is true
and if i am lieing let lightning strike me down
(goes back to showing the drunk ant and hes standing on a table yelling this to everyone)

But...if you only knew..
That even death the worst of words..is the prettiest of sounds
(drunk ant sitting there restrained by bigger ants)

The seasons came and the seasons went
and happy were my seasons spent
(showing the ant as his young self holding the hand of a girl ant)

Though with happiness comes deep regret
and saddness has its turn
(shows the girl and getting carried away by a bird)

But i have chased a shooting star
and have tamed a killer
(other ants laughing at him in disbelief)
(picture of him standing on a cats nose while the cat is sleeping)

Nothing compares
To When Your Aware
That Simple Things Are For living

(shows ant sailing away across the water)


...

Above The Grass And Through The Trees
Past The Sand Unto To Sea
Does Beauty Still Remain
In An Ocean Made Of Fallen Leaves

alot

Jeremy Day - Chapter 2 - Bowling
I slept in and Jeremy called me and woke me up
An hour and a half later we leave
We tried two stores but none of them carry Jeremy sized clothes
After we go bowling
....i suck at bowling
When bowling was over we went to the park
we sat down and watched ducks and old people
He gave me a scarf
Hes my favorite Jeremy in the whole world

Characters- Daughter,Mother,Father,Friends 1,2 And 3

Act One-1-Morning

Scene-1-Daughter Wakes Up And Goes To Register In A School Then Comes Home Early Because She Wasnt Properly Signed In

Scene-2-She Wakes Up And The Her Parents invite Her To A Moive

Scene-3-After The Movie Father Complains About How Long The Movie Went On And Mother Grabs Daughters Hand And Holds It All The Way Through The Parking Lot Until They Reach The Car

Scene-4-On The Ride Home The Girl Looks Out The Window To Return And Later Win Prizez With Friends

She Realizes Today Was The First Time That She Both her parents Had Been Together Just The 3 Of Them in 10 years..

Is Thiis It [11:20 PM]:  would you like me to tell you a story 
 felipedigit [11:20 PM]:  yes very much so
 Is Thiis It [11:21 PM]:  :tucks you in and sits by you: 
 Is Thiis It [11:22 PM]:  Once upon a time not to long ago in a place not to far from here 
 Is Thiis It [11:22 PM]:  There was a little rain cloud who was all alone
 Is Thiis It [11:22 PM]:  he floated for miles and no one would talk to him until finally he met a tree 
 Is Thiis It [11:23 PM]:  the tree was small and had brown and yellow leaves and was all alone itself 
 Is Thiis It [11:23 PM]:  so the rain cloud hovered by him and said 
 Is Thiis It [11:23 PM]:  Tree What is to become of me i am alone and i need you 
 felipedigit [11:24 PM]:  u huh
 Is Thiis It [11:24 PM]:  To which the tree replyed 
I need you as well to make me strong and i swear ill nver let you down 
 Is Thiis It [11:25 PM]:  So the cloud rained down on the tree for days and days until autumn came to summer and by then the tree was very big and strong bt still the rain cloud was small 
 Is Thiis It [11:25 PM]:  So the tree make new friends and the cloud was all alone again 
 Is Thiis It [11:26 PM]:  and leaves changed from the tree until it was winter and the tree become cold and by spring the tree was weak and small again 
 Is Thiis It [11:27 PM]:  so the tree said what is to become of me i am alone and i need you 
 Is Thiis It [11:27 PM]:  And the cloud replyed with a bolt of lightning 
 Is Thiis It [11:27 PM]:  and the tree fell and the cloud left 
 Is Thiis It [11:27 PM]:  the end

 felipedigit [11:28 PM]:  did you make that up
 Is Thiis It [11:28 PM]:  Yup
